thread.title: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'?
thread.title_full: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Vaani Kapoor to be cast opposite Ranveer Singh in 'Befikre'?
text:
After her Bollywood debut in 'Shuddh Desi Romance' (2013), *Vaani Kapoor* has found herself at a loose end.*Vaani Kapoor*
Though the actress did a Tamil film 'Aaha Kalyanam' (2014), she has been missing from the Bollywood scene.*Ranveer Singh*
The Yash Raj discovery, if the grapevine is to be believed, might be roped in for ... Â»
